segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, just waiting for her brother to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent, but she’s part of the problem too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s funny how she’s just standing there like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, stretching as far as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes is so focused, she doesn’t even see them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is just pouring out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing feels like a scene from a cartoon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get away with it, and that’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they share those cookies with me.
segments.speaker: PAR
